actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify the treatment of certain buildings under the rehabilitation credit.

summary.text: Declares that a building shall not be treated as being ineligible for the rehabilitation credit by reason of being relocated if the rehabilitation at the relocated site began before the date of a specified Treasury regulation.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify the treatment of certain buildings under the rehabilitation credit.
